creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque made from three consecutive rings; each ring ends in a curlicue; connecting piece is on strip of flat silver decorated by three medium-sized wire cones; rings are decorated with four panels of animal scenes divided by vertical lines; first panel shows goat, rat, and pig; second panel shows dog, rooster, and monkey; third panel shows dog, goat, and snake; fourth panel shows dragon, rat, and dog
title: Torque
